Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Contains classes used to setup a Server that accepts both RMI and Sockets clients.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RmiClientInterface
    This interface exposes some rmi-client's methods rmi-server can call.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientReception
    This class allows to manage parallel client enrollments.
    GameCountDown
    This class manage the countdown after the minimum players number is reached.
    RmiCommunication
    This class represent a single communication between server and client according to rmi technology.
    RmiServer
    This class represent the server for communications using rmi, implementing the interface exposed to rmi client.
    Server
    This class is the executable class for the server-side of the game.
    ServerManager
    This class manages all communications on the server-side.
    SingleCommunication
    This class represent a single communication between server and client regardless the communication technology.
    SocketCommunication
    This class represent a single communication between server and client according to socket technology.
    SocketServer
    This class represent the server for communications using socket.
